name: Jazz Time
description:
Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020 

Description:
You, a time traveler, accidentally crash your time machine into the New York Stock Exchange somewhere in the 1920s, causing the stock market crash and the Great Depression to begin. Now, you must mingle with Stonk Brokers, Mafios, and Flapper Gals to find your machine parts and get the heck out of town!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Ctrl to Crouch
  • E to interact
  • ESC to close the game

Credits:

  • Keavon Chambers, Environment Artist
  • Joe DeLuca, Gameplay Programmer
  • Yu Park, Sound Designer
  • Gabriella Santiago, Character Designer
  • Conor Walsh, Narrative Designer
  • Nathan Ybanez, Level Designer
